00589 #define EXP_OP_STATIC     0x00  
00590 #define EXP_OP_SIG        0x01  
00591 #define EXP_OP_XOR        0x02

00639 #define EXP_OP_PARAM      0x32  
00640 #define EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT 0x33  
00641 #define EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT 0x34  
00648 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_STATIC) && \
00649                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00650                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LIST) && \
00651                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00652                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00653                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00654                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00655                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DEFAULT) && \
00656                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM) && \
00657                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT) && \
00658                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT) && \
00659                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY) && \
00660                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00661                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00662                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00663                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00664                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND))) ? 1 : 0)
00665 
00670 #define EXPR_IS_STATIC(x)        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_STATIC)     || \
00671                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM)      || \
00672                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT) || \
00673                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT))
00674 
00679 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE( x ) & \
00680                                     ~expression_is_static_only( x ) & \
00681                                     (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE( x->suppl ) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE( x->suppl )))

01136  (this is a brainstorm on how to handle FSMs when we get to this point).  Fixed
01137  bug with code underlining function in handling parameter in reports.  Fixing bugs
01138  with MBIT/SBIT handling (this is not verified to be completely correct yet).

01142  output in report command and updating full regression.
01143

01145  Fixing C compatibility problems with cc and gcc.  Found a few possible problems
01146  with 64-bit vs. 32-bit compilation of the tool.  Fixed bug in parser that
01147  lead to bus errors.  Ran full regression in 64-bit mode without error.
01148

01151  produced automatically by CVS.  Should fix warning messages from compiler.
01152

01154  Adding statement iterators for moving in both directions in a list with a single
01155  pointer (two-way).  This allows us to reverse statement lists without additional
01156  memory and time (very efficient).  Full regression passes and TODO list items
01157  2 and 3 are completed.
01158

01163  parameters are handled as far as scoring purposes are concerned but we no

01183  point and the most commonly used parameter usages have been verified.  Some
01184  bugs were fixed in handling default values of constants and expression tree
